title: Makes provisions relating to freedom of speech and petition in certain shopping centers and shopping malls
summary: Provides that persons shall have the right to exercise the freedom of speech and the freedom to petition in shopping malls subject to reasonable time, place and manner regulations; requires every shopping center to prepare and publish an accommodation plan stating its policy with respect to the public's exercise of first amendment rights; provides that no person need post a bond or make payment for exercising the right of freedom of speech or freedom to petition; provides that shopping malls must make display space available for the posting of announcements, public service messages, etc.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to freedom of speech and petition in certain shopping centers and shopping malls
